bioconda.name: circos
bioconda.summary: Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information. It visualizes data in a circular layout

biocontainers.name: circos
biocontainers.summary: Circos is tool for visualizing data in a circular format. it was developed for genomic data but can work for many other kinds of data as well.

biotools.summary: Circos is tool for visualizing data in a circular format. It was developed for genomic data but can work for many other kinds of data as well.

bioschemas.name: Circos
bioschemas.summary: Circos is tool for visualizing data in a circular format. It was developed for genomic data but can work for many other kinds of data as well.
